doc:
Maurice Poli https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maurice_Poli 0 Maurice Poli (born 2 December 1933) is a French actor, mainly active in Italian productions. He is regarded as one of the few actors to have taken part in virtually all the genres developed in Italy in over more than thirty years.Born in Bizerte, Tunisia, Poli made his film debut in 1961, in a very small role in Mauro Bolognini's The Lovemakers. He later alternated leading roles and supporting roles, being often cast as a tough guy or a villain. Following a fashion of the time for American-sounding stage names, in the second half of the 1960s he was credited Monty Greenwood in several spaghetti westerns. Maurice_Poli ( born_2_December_1933 ) is a_French_actor , mainly active in Italian_productions . He is_regarded as one of the_few_actors to_have_taken part in virtually_all_the_genres developed in Italy in over more_than_thirty_years.Born in Bizerte , Tunisia , Poli made his_film_debut in 1961 , in a_very_small_role in Mauro_Bolognini 's_The_Lovemakers . He later alternated_leading roles and supporting roles , being_often_cast as a_tough_guy or a_villain . Following a_fashion of the_time for American-sounding_stage_names , in the_second_half of the_1960s he was_credited Monty_Greenwood in several_spaghetti_westerns .
